reviewText: I lost the old copy from TV so had to buy another one.  What's not to love about Antonio??  "Loved"  him on General Hospital and in everything else.  Knowing he's a Conservative just makes him more appealing.
I love this movie. Only wish it was in dvd, maybe someday soon.
I was not thrilled with this movie and began to lose interest half way through it.  I found it a little too prdictable.
It was a fun little movie.  But any rollercoaster nut would probably like movies like this.  Reminds me a little of the old 1977 film "Rollercoaster" with George Segal.  Worth a look, both of them.

The first time I saw this movie was on CBS when it appeared on TV a long time ago.  I love the action it has and the story about a father and his daughter trying to get over the loss of mother and wife.  To me it is a movie about letting go of your fears and love.
